data.message: Can you fix my fb app from crashing . I go to fb pages and can't open pics etc without it crashing . I've tried all the solutions . Resetting phone reinstalling app etc . It's been doing this since I last updated it . It's driving me nuts

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that. Please give us more information by filling out this form: http://bit.ly/2jMoDm1. -Nick

Okay. Now it's just crashing period no matter what . I go to a page and starT to scroll and closes . What is wrong w fb that no matter what I do my app isn't working . I deleted and reinstalled it and still doesn't work !!!
